channel.title: 403 forbidden on Güngör Budak

item.title: Permission Issues develop Laravel 4 on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
item.description: If your CSS or JS files don’t seem to load or you get 403 Forbidden or Permissions denied, all you need to do is to run following on terminal: sudo chmod -R 755 /path/to/your/laravel/directory
